unavailable_l: %s در سطح %s در دسترس قرار می‌گیرد.
hero_upgrade_description: You can uprade your hero by potion to push them into the World Of Elite Heroes enhances power and abilities of heroes.
card_sell_warn: Do you want to put this card on the market for %s gold? Other players will bid for it so the final price might be higher.
card_max_power: قدرت کارت بیشتر از این نمی‌شه!
card_no_sibling: هیچ کارتی برای ادغام وجود نداره!
card_holder_unavailable: '%s در سطح%s' در دسترس خواهد بود
combo_unavailable_description: You haven't discovered this combo yet
combo_1_description: Oldest and simplest of secret combo techniques passed down by master warriors through the ages
combo_2_description: It is said that identical twins that fight side by side become invincible
combo_3_description: The harmony between four brothers has amazing potential!
combo_4_description: Requiring precise control, this is one of the hardest combo techniques to use
combo_5_description: Only the most powerful monster warriors can pull this off and only through intense concentration and coordination
combo_6_description: The final form of night's embrace, shadow strike takes the evil to new heights!
combo_7_description: Monsters of all levels are needed to pull this one off
combo_8_description: A game changer, use this to overcome even the strongest of opponents!
heroitem_1_description: The miraculous leaf that heals creatures.
heroitem_2_description: Instantly turns the world into a tragic garden.
heroitem_3_description: An Ironic leaf that attracts any type of loot.
heroitem_4_description: An Enhanced knife painted in blood.
heroitem_5_description: Curses its enemies in a deep dark ambient.
heroitem_6_description: A heroic creature that rules the seven seas.
heroitem_7_description: Blows out anything in its way and electrifies everything.
heroitem_8_description: Hits enemy at the right moment in right place.
heroitem_9_description: One of the sharpest most powerful sword in the world.
heroitem_10_description: Puts your army in high cotton in the middle of a battle!
heroitem_11_description: Dances with devils and attracts lots of gold.
heroitem_12_description: Attacking insidiously to the opponent while smiling.
heroitem_locked: قهرمان سطح %s در دسترس خواهد بود
potion_description: In order to trigger a combo, you need to have the right combination of cards and enough potions. Remember that if your top four cards can create a combo you will automatically use a combo when defending against offline attacks. For evolving hero cards, you need potions too.
building_treasury_d: You can use the bank to keep your gold safe from attack and save up for more expensive stuff. There's just a small %$$percent transaction cost which will be deducted when you deposit gold.
building_mine_d: The gold building is a place that you can place your cards to work for you. Cards assigned to this building will slowly generate gold for you, the more cards you assign the higher the rate of gold generation.
building_defense_d: The defense building is one of the buildings that you receive once you join a tribe. This building increases the defensive power of all your cards by a certain percentage.
building_offense_d: The offense building is one of the buildings that you receive once you join a tribe. This building increases the offensive power of all your cards giving you an advantage in battles and quests.
settings_restore_get: You can play Fruitcraft on your other devices too, simply enter the code shown below in your other devices.
settings_restore_set: You can play your game on all of your mobile devices simply by entering the restore code. The restore code can be found in the setting page.
settings_invite_get: For every player you invite you get an increasing gold reward. All you have to do is tell others to enter your invite code when they start the game.
settings_gift_set: You can get special rewards like gold, potion and ... by consuming your reward code.
shop_card_5_desc: ۲۰ کارت سطح یک و ۱۰ کارت سطح دو
tribe_help_new: If you don't feel like joining one of the existing tribes you can create your own. You'll need to have 15K gold to create a tribe, this gold will go towards providing you with a 5% defense bonus for all of your cards.
tribe_help_edit: You can edit your tribe description. Tribes that are not in the top 25 can change their name too. Since other players generally recognize your tribe by name it's best not to change names regularly.
tribe_invite_description: You can invite players that you think are suitable to your tribe. Once they accept your invitation they will be automatically added to your tribe.
tribe_donate_description: You can give some of your own gold to the tribe in order to purchase a building sooner.
auction_bid_sell: %s has bid on one of your cards!
message_5_1: Terrible news! %s attacked you and your army was crushed!
message_5_2: No way! You just lost a battle against %s!
message_14: %s  مقدار  %s طلا به قبیله اهدا کرد!
achievement_6_message: You've collected %s gold for your tribe!
achievement_9_message: Reached level %s, discount on gold purchase!
achievement_11_message: You've visited the Fruitcraft Facebook page and shown your support.
achievement_13_message: You've visited the Fruitcraft Instagram page and shown your support.
Almond_d:
Sly nut
Everything shiny makes him crazy! He's always planning challenging heists. When will he stop his craziness? Most likely never :)
Banana_d:
Strong warrior
He has a mysterious past. We're convinced that he's from an old mystical tribe in the Amazon. He's mostly found hanging out with his buddy Wilson.
LemonC_d:
Acid warrior
He literally can't contain his acidity. Lemon is always looking for a fun way to splash acid on other fruits!
Eggplant_d:
Super smart fruit
Eggplant is passionate about all subjects linked to science. She is incredibly intelligent and has worked with Einstein on several projects!
CucumberC_d:
Ninja fruit
A ninja from the Shinjiku clan, Cucumber has mastered all forms of Japanese weapons. Few have gone against him and survived.
Crystal_t CardPack Warning: Cards from the crystal pack have very high enhancement limits however it is more costly to enhance them. Their recovery time is longer than usual but the recovery cost is fixed and very low.
Garlic_d:
Stinky fruit
Granny Garlic has an incredibly powerful odor. She's learned to use this stench to her advantage and manages to subdue her opponents without raising a finger.
Hazelnut_d:
Nature nut
A true nature lover and beloved by squirrels. He takes care of Fruitcraft by planting seeds everywhere he goes.
OrangeE_d:
Monster Fruit
For the past 500 years elder blood oranges have lived in Transylvania. Now that Fruitcraft has become a global phenomena they have decided to join in on the fun.
BlackberryE_d:
Monster Fruit
Through occult rituals, blackberry has become a true demon, granting him unbelievable power!
Strawberry_d:
Magical fruit
She's been training to improve her skills in the Angel Academy. She secretly loves Pomegranate because of his funny looking mustache.
Sibilu_d:
✪Jack Of All Trades
 Sibi the Sheriff is a man of justice and honor. He deals with all kinds of villains from the fastest to the wisest and that's why he is a jack of all trades in battlefield.
Xebelus_d:
✪Master Of Agility
 Well-known hero that is in love with gold, gold and gold. He can find gold everywhere in easiest and fastest way. If you have gold, be careful about Xebelus.
Hushidar_d:
✪Grand Master
 Investigating about 1000 years around healing tricks , makes him The Grand Master of dark forest a.k.a Hushidar.
Xakhmi_d:
✪Scarface
 Exprienced warrior with deep scar on his face that is memento of a old war against dark forces. His exprience in battling makes him very powerful.
Coconut_d:
Pirate warrior
Pirates in an exotic island adopted him when he was young and taught him all he knows. After years of hard work he's become the captain of his own ship.
Watermelon_d:
Big fruit
Watermelon dreams of becoming the strongest fruit in all of Fruitcraft. He spends most of his time training with ridiculously large weights.
Star_d:
Aqua fruit
A champion of the seven seas, star fruit has managed to gain the aqua crystal of power and gain the love of all see creatures.
Mango_d:
Spiritual fruit
Mangos spend most of their time meditating on the secrets of life. That's why it is said that mangos are so delicious and bring spiritual healing.
SugarApple_d:
Odd fruit
In his search for power Apple managed to get his hands on a forbidden Mayan crystal, it made him super strong but pretty weird looking.
Dragon_d:
Legendary fruit
There is little known of this legendary fruit, only that no one has ever faced him and lived!
Tomato_d:
Fat fruit
Tomato loves eating. He's technically a cannibal when he eats other tomatoes while eating a burger or using ketchup.
Pomegranate_d:
Strong warrior
Hailing from Turkey, Pomegranate started out as a butcher, but when a war broke out he went into the military.  It wasn't long before he rose through the ranks.
PomegranateC_d:
Strong warrior
Hailing from Turkey, Pomegranate started out as a butcher, but when a war broke out he went into the military.  It wasn't long before he rose through the ranks.
Corn_d:
Mexican fruit
Corn is a Mexican patriot, looking to spread the great culture of his people to other fruits throughout Fruitcraft.
Pistachio_d:
Defensive fruit
Pistachio's strong armor protects him from all forms of damage. He usually acts as a defensive barrier.
Blackberry_d:
Black magic fruit
Blackberry is a lover of all things occult and is a powerful practitioner of dark magic. He's usually seen hanging out with Banana.
Lemon_d:
Acid warrior
He literally can't contain his acidity. Lemon is always looking for a fun way to splash acid on other fruits!
Peach_d:
Kinky fruit
Peach has particular interests that others might find unseemly, however this doesn't dampen her spirit and she lives life the way that she feels will make her happy.
Pumpkin_d:
Punisher fruit
A survivor of a Halloween massacre, Pumpkin has been searching for greater power to get revenge on those that wronged him and his family.
Cucumber_d:
Ninja fruit
A ninja from the Shinjiku clan, Cucumber has mastered all forms of Japanese weapons. Few have gone against him and survived.
Date_d:
Desert fruit
Date was a simple desert nomad, living a free and uncomplicated life. One day exploring the dunes he discovered an old lamp with magical powers.
Cherry_d:
Twin fruit
The cherry twins are crazy about comics and manga. They love to dress up as their favorite characters.
Mushroom_d:
Hippie fruit
Mushroom is a hippie. He likes to relax and enjoy music. He's apposed to conflicts and his motto is 'make love not war'.
Caqui_d:
Squishy fruit
A soft and friendly fruit, she always tries to help others out.
MushroomE_d:
Monster Fruit
With all the crazy drugs that mushroom was taking, it was only a matter of time before he turned into an immortal zombie.
Pear_d:
Peaceful fruit
Pear is a lovable fruit. Always aiming to be the most beautiful woman in Fruitcraft, she's seen wearing elegant jewelry.
Kiwi_d:
Crazy fruit
Kiwi started out as a court jester and gradually learned more and more illusion magic from Grape. He cares dearly about putting on a great show.
Grape_d:
Magical fruit
Grape's strength lies in the multitude. The more 'awakened' grapes there are the more powerful he gets. His skill lies in powerful illusion magic.
CherryE_d:
Monster Fruit
Once the cherry twins wore these cursed outfits they felt that they really needed to kill something and unfortunately some outfits once worn can't be taken off…
Olive_d:
Strong warrior
Olive is one of Zeus's sons. Living as a Spartan warrior when he was young, his demigod powers awakened as he gained more experience in battle.
FigE_d:
Monster Fruit
Fig is the fruit of kings and the ancient Egyptians wrapped up a few for their Pharaohs.
Carrot_d:
Barbarian fruit
Carrot has been around since the time of the cave men. His fighting style may be primitive, however he makes up for it with brute strength.
Pineapple_d:
Surfer fruit
A native of Hawaii, Pineapple spends most of his time on the beach. He's either chillin' with a drink, surfing the awesome waves or just hanging with friends.
Apple_d:
Cool fruit
Apple has a cool demeanor and sees all of life as a game. Don't let his whimsical temperament fool you, he always uses right tools for whatever job he's on.
PearC_d:
Peaceful fruit
Pear is a lovable fruit. Always aiming to be the most beautiful woman in Fruitcraft, she's seen wearing elegant jewelry.
Lychee_d:
Honorable fruit
Lychee was trained in an ancient Chinese dojo founded by his ancestors. He only uses his skills for honorable causes.
Fig_d:
Party fruit
Fig is a party animal. Always looking for the best party in town and hanging out in the loudest discos. His smooth moves always make him the center of any party.
Orange_d:
Fire warrior
He is passionate and fiery. His incredible strength lies in his ability to store up solar energy. That's where the fire comes from.
KiwiC_d:
Crazy fruit
Kiwi started out as a court jester and gradually learned more and more illusion magic from Grape. He cares dearly about putting on a great show.

notif_2_body: Vitamin C boosts your immune system
